Mathematics - K-Theory and Homology
20E42 (Primary), 20F65, 20J05, 19C09, 20J06 (Secondary)
creator: Essert, Jan
title: Buildings, Group Homology and Lattices
description:
This is the author's PhD thesis, published at the Universit\"at M\"unster,
Germany in 2010. It contains a detailed description of the results of
arXiv:0903.1989, arXiv:0905.0071 and arXiv:0908.2713.

Comment: 171 pages, PhD thesis, Universit\"at M\"unster, see
